sentences.en: "Well, dear," her hostess would reply with a frigid smile.
sentences.cn: “噢，亲爱的，”她的女主人会笑容僵硬地回答。

sentences.en: I'll make a bargain with you. I'll play hostess if you'll include Matthew in your guest-list.
sentences.cn: 我们说定了，如果你能把马修也邀请来的话我就做东。

sentences.en: Mary was always the perfect hostess.
sentences.cn: 玛丽总是最殷勤的女主人。

sentences.en: One of the hostess's duties is to mingle with the guests.
sentences.cn: 女主人的职责之一是与客人们交际.

sentences.en: Our hostess served up a large bowl of steaming hot dumplings.
sentences.cn: 女主人端上一大碗热气腾腾的饺子.

sentences.en: She had become a nightclub hostess.
sentences.cn: 她当上了一家夜总会的女招待.

sentences.en: She was a superb hostess to us all.
sentences.cn: 她对我们大家来说都是个出色的女主人。

sentences.en: The guest of honour is seated on the right side of the hostess.
The hostess greeted her guests with ease.
sentences.cn: 女主人大方地迎接她的客人.

sentences.en: The hostess iced a bottle of beer.
The hostess pressed fish on her guests.
The hostess served refreshments after the tennis matches.
sentences.cn: 网球赛后女主人请大家吃茶点.

sentences.en: The hostess set a lamp on the table.
sentences.cn: 女主人把一盏灯放在桌子上.

sentences.en: While we were waiting to land, the air - hostess told us to keep calm.
sentences.cn: 当我们等待着陆的时候, 一位飞机乘务员叫我们保持镇静.

女主人，女老板；女服务员；舞女；女房东

trans.tran_cn: 女主人，舞女，（电视或广播节目的）女主持人
trans.tran_en: a woman at a party, meal etc who has invited all the guests and provides them with food, drink etc
